Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-47683 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.56.1-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-47683 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.56.1-5. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.56.1-5, affected by CVE-2024-47683
